channel.title: Codes on Mike Treglia
channel.description: Recent content in Codes on Mike Treglia

item.title: Code
item.description: Overview iButton Data Organizer NetCDF Data Access LAStools Wrapper Functions from R Overview I primarily use R for scientific computing, but also dabble in bash, and use SQL a fair bit for spatial stuff, working from PostgreSQL/PostGIS databases. I’ll disclaim that I have limited formal training in coding, but have been really fortunate for opportunities to improve my skills through a few opportunities I’d encourage others to look into. First, in 2014 I attended a joint NCEAS/RENCI Open Science for Synthesis session, focused in training early career scientists useful computing tools to allow for reproducible research.
